verbose_text: TUNEL staining showed that apoptosis was prominently increased in the HIF-1alpha-miRNA group compared with the untreated and Scrambled groups (XREF_FIG; P < 0.01), Thus, these data show that silencing HIF-1alpha expression by miRNA significantly inhibits expression of HIF-1alpha mRNA and protein, and suppresses growth of human pulmonary adenocarcinoma in tumor bearing nude mice.
